darkFalzInterception.title: Drill: Dark Falz Interception
darkFalzInterception.clearCondition: This pracitce drill is a simulation from the archive to help you prepare for the coming battle. The current settings will allow you to reenact fierce fighting in Central Aelio. Make use of all your skills to defeat Dark Falz.
